ingredients: 2   +   1/2 cups ground cherries,   +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons water, 1 (9 inch) pie shell, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 3 tablespoons white sugar, 2 tablespoons butter
